code:
export const quiz2 = {
  "quizTitle": "Section 2: Sights, Barrels, and Mags",
  "quizSynopsis": "You gotta be a real Destiny nerd to know these.",
  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> (Harder) Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Bring it on!",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions."
  },
  "questions": [{
    "answers": ["Accurized Rounds", "Rangefinder", "Ambitious Assassin", "High-Velocity Rounds"],
    "questionType": "text",
    "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/b3/Accurized_rounds_icon1.png",
    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Just making sure we know our basics. I promise it'll get challenging.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Uh oh, that one shouldn't have been too difficult. It's only gonna get harder from here.",
    "explanation": "Accurized Rounds: This weapon can fire long distances. (Range +10)",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/1/1d/Drop_mag_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Alloy Magazine", "Flared Magwell", "Drop Mag", "Swap Mag"],
    "correctAnswer": "3",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Piece of cake. Let's get some more free points.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Magazines are a tricky one. Let's get the next one.",
    "explanation": "Drop Mag: Magazine drops on reload, wasting ammunition but greatly increasing reload speed. (Reload Speed +30)",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/f/f7/Full_choke_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Full Bore", "Barrel Shroud", "Full Choke", "Rifled Barrel"],
    "correctAnswer": "3",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Indeed, this is the first thing we look for on every shotgun. You must be familiar.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "If anything, this proves you are not a shotgun ape. Let me thank you personally, good friend.",
    "explanation": "Full Choke: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.",
    "point": "5"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/64/Appended_mag_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Appended Mag", "Light Mag", "Assault Mag", "Tactical Mag"],
    "correctAnswer": "1",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Nice one! I'm not even sure if I would've gotten that one.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This one was a little harder - I'm not even sure if I would've gotten it.",
    "explanation": "Appended Mag: This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity. Increases magazine size.",
    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Chambered_compensator_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Fluted Barrel", "Chambered Compensator", "Arrowhead Brake", "Full Bore"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "You, my friend, may play a little bit too much PvP. I thought this was hard.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "I feel the same way. Why do all these barrel perks look the same?!?",
    "explanation": "Chambered Compensator: Stable barrel attachment. Increases stability. Improves recoil direction. Slightly decreases handling speed.",
    "point": "10"
  }, {
    "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
    "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/69/Alloy_casing_icon1.png",
    "questionType": "text",
    "answers": ["Augmented Drum", "Alloy Casing", "Mini Frags", "Impact Casing"],
    "correctAnswer": "2",
    "messageForCorrectAnswer": "You are a true connoisseur - or perhaps blessed by Lady Luck. Seriously, good job.",
    "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This one was difficult - nigh impossible. Who even uses grenade launchers/rocket launchers anyways?",
    "explanation": "Alloy Casing: Reduces weight for faster reloads. Greatly increases reload speed. Decreases stability.",
    "point": "15"
  }]
};
export default quiz2;

sourcesContent:
export const quiz2 =  {
  "quizTitle": "Section 2: Sights, Barrels, and Mags",
  "quizSynopsis": "You gotta be a real Destiny nerd to know these.",

  "appLocale": {
    "landingHeaderText": "<questionLength> (Harder) Perks",
    "question": "Perk",
    "startQuizBtn": "Bring it on!",
    "resultFilterAll": "All",
    "resultFilterCorrect": "Correct",
    "resultFilterIncorrect": "Incorrect",
    "nextQuestionBtn": "Next",
    "resultPageHeaderText": "You have completed this section. You got <correctIndexLength> out of <questionLength> questions."
  },

  "questions": [
    {
      "answers": [
        "Accurized Rounds",
        "Rangefinder",
        "Ambitious Assassin",
        "High-Velocity Rounds"
      ],
      "questionType": "text",
      "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/b/b3/Accurized_rounds_icon1.png",
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Just making sure we know our basics. I promise it'll get challenging.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Uh oh, that one shouldn't have been too difficult. It's only gonna get harder from here.",
      "explanation": "Accurized Rounds: This weapon can fire long distances. (Range +10)",
      "point": "5"
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/1/1d/Drop_mag_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Alloy Magazine",
        "Flared Magwell",
        "Drop Mag",
        "Swap Mag"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "3",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Piece of cake. Let's get some more free points.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "Magazines are a tricky one. Let's get the next one.",
      "explanation": "Drop Mag: Magazine drops on reload, wasting ammunition but greatly increasing reload speed. (Reload Speed +30)",
      "point": "5"
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this? (Easy)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/f/f7/Full_choke_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Full Bore",
        "Barrel Shroud",
        "Full Choke",
        "Rifled Barrel"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "3",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Indeed, this is the first thing we look for on every shotgun. You must be familiar.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "If anything, this proves you are not a shotgun ape. Let me thank you personally, good friend.",
      "explanation": "Full Choke: Tightened barrel. Reduces projectile spread when aiming down sights at the cost of precision damage.",
      "point": "5"
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/64/Appended_mag_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Appended Mag",
        "Light Mag",
        "Assault Mag",
        "Tactical Mag"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "1",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "Nice one! I'm not even sure if I would've gotten that one.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This one was a little harder - I'm not even sure if I would've gotten it.",
      "explanation": "Appended Mag: This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity. Increases magazine size.",
      "point": "10"
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/3/3e/Chambered_compensator_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Fluted Barrel",
        "Chambered Compensator",
        "Arrowhead Brake",
        "Full Bore"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "You, my friend, may play a little bit too much PvP. I thought this was hard.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "I feel the same way. Why do all these barrel perks look the same?!?",
      "explanation": "Chambered Compensator: Stable barrel attachment. Increases stability. Improves recoil direction. Slightly decreases handling speed.",
      "point": "10"
    },
    {
      "question": "What perk is this? (Medium)",
      "questionPic": "https://d2.destinygamewiki.com/mediawiki/images/6/69/Alloy_casing_icon1.png",
      "questionType": "text",
      "answers": [
        "Augmented Drum",
        "Alloy Casing",
        "Mini Frags",
        "Impact Casing"
      ],
      "correctAnswer": "2",
      "messageForCorrectAnswer": "You are a true connoisseur - or perhaps blessed by Lady Luck. Seriously, good job.",
      "messageForIncorrectAnswer": "This one was difficult - nigh impossible. Who even uses grenade launchers/rocket launchers anyways?",
      "explanation": "Alloy Casing: Reduces weight for faster reloads. Greatly increases reload speed. Decreases stability.",
      "point": "15"
    }
  ]
}

export default quiz2;
